page.title: 01GAZETEER OF THE AREA.
page.content: This block covers the{S.S.W. {suburbs of Leicester}from within a mile of the centre to the city/county boundary. Although the area is mainly {residential}it also contains a large area of{open ground}(Aylestone Water Meadows),{industrial estates,}and major{suburban shopping areas. Three vital City road links pass through this area{A50, A426}and the {A46}(which leads to the{M1 & M69 {motorways);}plus the main{railway link with the rest of the country. Also within this area lies the {Grand Union Canal,}the city{Power {Station and Cattle Market}and the REMAINS of the old{Gas Works}and{Great {Central Railway.} These suburbs contain the old villages of{Aylestone}and{Knighton}as well as the{Braunstone}&{Saffron Lane council housing estates.
